title: Quiz - CurrentTap - ESI - 16th to 22nd February 2023
instruction: The I2U2 partnership is a grouping focused on driving tangible economic cooperation between its members across a range of sectors. These include food security, water, energy, space, transportation, health, and technology. It aims to mobilize private sector capital and expertise to help modernize infrastructure, decarbonize industries, improve public heath, and promote development of green technologies.

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), the Prime Minister has praised the initiative of ‘Suposhit Maa’, launched by Lok Sabha speaker to keep every mother and child healthy. ‘Suposhit Maa’ was launched in which of the following years?
options: 2017
2022
2020
2021
2019

quiz.text: As per recent (Feb 2023) news, Minister of state for Health and Family Welfare has inaugurated the National workshop on Accelerating Patient Safety in India. Which of the following is/are the strategic objectives of the Global Patient Safety Action Plan: 2021-2030?
options: Policies to eliminate avoidable harm in health care.
High-reliability systems.
Safety of clinical processes.
Patient and family engagement.
All of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), ‘Jadui Pitara’, a play-based learning-teaching material tailored for children between the age group of_________ has been launched by Union Education Minister.
options: 3-8 years
4-10 years
8-12 years
3-10 years
8-16 years

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to Jadui Pitara?

A.      It has been developed by NCERT.

B.      Learning and Development focuses on seven domains.

C.      It will be made digitally available on DIKSHA platform.
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), the Ministry of Education has directed states/UT to align their age of admission of children for Grade-I to _________ years.
options: 4+
8+
5+
7+
6+

quiz.text: As per recent (Feb 2023) news, ___________ will formally join the India Hydrogen Alliance (IH2A) and support large-scale green hydrogen hubs and projects with an indicative funding of 1 billion euros.
options: Germany
France
European Investment Bank
Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
1 and 2

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), ____________ campaign of United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) to raise awareness about the climate emergency, has won Gold and Silver in two different categories at the 2nd Annual Anthem Awards.
options: ‘Don’t Choose Plastic’
‘Don’t Choose Extinction’
‘Don’t Choose Meat’
‘Don’t Choose Fossil Fuels’
None of the above

quiz.text:
Recently (Feb 2023), the consultative committee for the Ministry of Ports, Shipping and Waterways (MoPSW) had a discussion on ‘Green Port and Green Shipping’ in Mumbai, Maharashtra. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to Green Ports and Green Shipping initiative of MIV (Maritime India Vision) 2030?

A.      It has a target to increase the share of renewable energy to 80% of the total power demand of each of its major Ports.

B.      It aims to reduce Carbon emissions, per ton of cargo handled, by 30% by the year 2030.

C.      Paradip Port (Odisha), Deendayal Port (Gujarat) and V.O. Chidambarar Port (Tamil Nadu) have been nominated for developing as Hydrogen Hubs by 2030.
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), as per information shared by Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate change a total of 2.26 million tonnes of plastic packaging has been covered under EPR for the year 2022-23. What does ‘P’ in EPR stands for?
options: Packaging
Plastic
People
Producer
Product

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), India has urged the member states to stay dedicated to the conservation and preservation of the oceans and support the UNCLOS. UNCLOS divides marine areas into ________ main zones.
options: three
four
seven
six
five

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), Union Minister for Science and Technology and Earth Science in a draft statement supported the High ambition coalition. The “BBNJ Treaty”, also known as the “Treaty of the __________ Seas”, is an international agreement on the conservation and sustainable use of marine biological diversity of areas beyond national jurisdiction within the framework of the UNCLOS.
options: High
International
Territorial
Exclusive
Contiguous

quiz.text:
Recently (Feb 2023), first meeting of Culture Working Group (CWG) of G20 has been organized by Ministry of Culture. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to the meeting?

A.      Meeting was organized at Gandhinagar, Gujarat.

B.      As a part of the meeting, an exhibition “Re(ad)dress: Return of Treasures” has been organised.

C.      The ‘Parrot Lady’ repatriated to India in 2015 by Britain was displayed in the meeting.
options: A and C
B and C
B only
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to Information Fusion Centre for Indian Ocean Region (IFC-IOR)?
options: It was established in 2018 by Government of India at Gurugram, Haryana.
It has been hosted by Indian Coast Guards.
It aims to enhance collaborative maritime safety and security in the Indian Ocean Region.
1 and 2
None of the above

quiz.text:
Recently (Feb 2023), 1st G20 Finance Ministers & Central Bank Governors meeting has

been held in which of the following places?
options: Indore
Chennai
Bengaluru
Mumbai
Kolkata

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), India & the United Arab Emirates (UAE) have launched the UAE India Business Council - UAE Chapter (UIBC-UC). The two nations aim to increase non-oil bilateral trade to _________ and attract USD 75 billion in investment from the UAE to India.
options: USD 50 billion
USD 75 billion
USD 150 billion
USD 100 billion
USD 120 billion

quiz.text: India-UAE CEPA aims to increase the trade in services to over _________ within five years.
options: USD 20 billion
USD 50 billion
USD 25 billion
USD 10 billion
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), 15th edition of ELECRAMA has been organised by the Indian Electrical and Electronics Manufacturers' Association (IEEMA) in Greater Noida. Which of the following was the theme of the 15th edition of ElECRAMA?
options: Reimagining Energy for Sustainable Future
Energy for Sustainable Future
Sustainable Future
Reimagining Electronics for Sustainable Future.
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), National Conference on “Geospatial Policy for National Development” has been organised by Department of Science and Technology in New Delhi. As per the information shared at the conference, ____________ will provide the baseline for collection and collation of Data by the private sector for strengthening the Geospatial Infrastructure.
options: ISRO
Survey of India
NIC
BHUVAN
BARC

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, Union Cabinet, chaired by Prime Minister Narendra Modi, has approved the extension of the term of the 22nd Law Commission of India up to ____________.
options: 31st August, 2025
31st August, 2024
31st March, 2024
31st March, 2025
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to Law Commission of India?

A.      Law Commission of India is a constitutional body.

B.      The first Commission was established in 1834 under the Charter Act of 1833.

C.      It consists of not more than five part-time members.
options: B and C
A and C
A and B
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), Prime Minister has chaired the meeting of 41st edition of PRAGATI. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to PRAGATI?
options: PRAGATI stands for ‘Pro-Active Governance and Timely Implementation’.
It was launched in 2015.
It was launched by the Prime Minister Office (PMO) in collaboration with ISRO.
PRAGATI Day is observed on 4th Wednesday of every month.
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), as per International Monetary Fund’s (IMF’s) World Economic Outlook (WEO), India’s growth to be at ________ in the fiscal year 2023.
options: 6.1%
6.3%
6.5%
7.1%
6.8%

quiz.text:
According to recently (Feb 2023) released SBI Ecowrap report, for the whole of current

fiscal, India’s GDP is estimated to grow between ____________.
options: 6.5 to 7.5 per cent
6.8 to 7.2 per cent
6.8 to 7 per cent
6.5 to 7 per cent
6.4 to 6.8 per cent

quiz.text: Recently (Feb 2023), according to the latest Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade data, total FDI inflows, which includes equity inflows, reinvested earnings and other capital, was ________ in April-December FY23.
options: USD 43.17 billion
USD 36.75 billion
USD 60.4 billion
USD 66.75 billion
USD 55.27 billion

quiz.text:
Recently (Feb 2023), I2U2 Business Forum’s Inaugural meeting has been hosted by UAE

in Abu Dhabi. Which of the following countries form the I2U2 grouping?
options: UAE, US, India and Israel
UAE, UK, India and Israel
UAE, US, India and Indonesia
UAE, UK, India and Indonesia
UAE, Uganda, India and Israel

quiz.text: On the sidelines of I2U2 meeting, India also joined the Agriculture Innovation Mission for Climate (AIM4C), which was launched by ________ at COP26 in 2021.
options: UK
UAE
Israel
1 and 2
2 and 3
